:allowDrop.description: Whether to allow dragging and dropping on the node
:allowDrop.description_zh: 是否允许拖拽时放置在该节点

autoExpandParent.description: Whether to automatically expand the parent node

blockNode.description: Whether the node occupies a row

checkable.description_zh: 节点前添加 Checkbox 复选框

:checkedKeys.description: (controlled) the tree node with the checkbox selected (Note: the parent node is associated, if the parent node key is passed, the child node is automatically selected; The key of the corresponding child node is passed in, and the parent node is automatically selected. When 'checkable' and 'checkStrictly' are set, it is an object with 'checked' and 'halfChecked' attributes, and the selection or absence of the parent node is no longer associated
:checkedKeys.description_zh: （受控）选中复选框的树节点（注意：父子节点有关联，如果传入父节点 key，则子节点自动选中；相应当子节点 key 都传入，父节点也自动选中。当设置 `checkable` 和 `checkStrictly`，它是一个有`checked`和`halfChecked`属性的对象，并且父子节点的选中与否不再关联

checkStrictly.description: Node selection is fully controlled in the checkable state (the selected state of the parent and child nodes is no longer associated)
checkStrictly.description_zh: checkable 状态下节点选择完全受控（父子节点选中状态不再关联）

:defaultCheckedKeys.description: By default, a tree node with the checkbox selected
:defaultCheckedKeys.description_zh: 默认选中复选框的树节点

defaultExpandAll.description: By default, all tree nodes are expanded

:defaultExpandedKeys.description: By default, the specified tree node is expanded
:defaultExpandedKeys.description_zh: 默认展开指定的树节点

defaultExpandParent.description: By default, the parent node is expanded

:defaultSelectedKeys.description: The tree node is selected by default

:draggable.description: The setting node can be dragged and the drag-and-drop tooltip icon can be turned off by 'icon: false'
:draggable.type: boolean / ((node: DataNode) => boolean) / { icon?: React.ReactNode / false, nodeDraggable?: (node: DataNode) => boolean }
:draggable.description_zh: 设置节点可拖拽，可以通过 `icon: false` 关闭拖拽提示图标

:fieldNames.description: Customize the fields of title, key, and children of the node
:fieldNames.default: { title: title, key: key, children: children }
:fieldNames.description_zh: 自定义节点 title、key、children 的字段

:filterTreeNode.description: Filter tree nodes (highlighted) as needed and return true
:filterTreeNode.description_zh: 按需筛选树节点（高亮），返回 true

:height.description: Set the height of the virtual scrolling container, after which the internal nodes no longer support horizontal scrolling
:height.description_zh: 设置虚拟滚动容器高度，设置后内部节点不再支持横向滚动

:icon.description: Insert a custom icon before the title. Need to set 'showIcon' to true
:icon.description_zh: 在标题之前插入自定义图标。需要设置 `showIcon` 为 true

:loadedKeys.description: (controlled) nodes that have already been loaded, and need to be used with 'loadData'
:loadedKeys.description_zh: （受控）已经加载的节点，需要配合 `loadData` 使用

multiple.description: Support for clicking on multiple nodes (node itself)
multiple.description_zh: 支持点选多个节点（节点本身）

rootClassName.description: Add the className to the outermost layer of the tree
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在 Tree 最外层的 className

:rootStyle.description: Add a style to the outermost layer of the tree
:rootStyle.description_zh: 添加在 Tree 最外层的 style

:selectedKeys.description: (Controlled) sets the selected tree nodes, and for multiple selections, set 'multiple' to true
:selectedKeys.description_zh: （受控）设置选中的树节点，多选需设置 `multiple` 为 true

showIcon.description: Control whether to display the 'icon' node, no default style
showIcon.description_zh: 控制是否展示 `icon` 节点，没有默认样式

:showLine.description: Whether or not to display the connection line

:switcherIcon.description: Custom expand/collapse icon for the tree node (with default rotate angle style)
:switcherIcon.description_zh: 自定义树节点的展开/折叠图标（带有默认 rotate 角度样式）

:switcherLoadingIcon.description: Custom loading icon for tree node
:switcherLoadingIcon.description_zh: 自定义树节点的加载图标

:treeData.description: treeNodes data, if set then you don't need to manually construct a TreeNode node (the key is unique across the tree)
:treeData.description_zh: treeNodes 数据，如果设置则不需要手动构造 TreeNode 节点（key 在整个树范围内唯一）

virtual.description: Turn off virtual scrolling when set to false
virtual.description_zh: 设置 false 时关闭虚拟滚动

events.name: onCheck
events.params: function(checkedKeys, e:{checked: boolean, checkedNodes, node, event, halfCheckedKeys})

events.name: onExpand
events.description: Triggered when a node is expanded/collapsed

events.name: onLoad
events.description: Triggered when the node is loaded

events.name: onSelect
events.description: Click on the tree node to trigger
events.params: function(selectedKeys, e:{selected: boolean, selectedNodes, node, event})

TreeNode.name: checkable
TreeNode.description: When the tree is checkable, set whether the independent node displays a Checkbox
TreeNode.description_zh: 当树为 checkable 时，设置独立节点是否展示 Checkbox

TreeNode.name: icon
TreeNode.description: Custom icon. Can receive components, props for the current node props
TreeNode.description_zh: 自定义图标。可接收组件，props 为当前节点 props

TreeNode.name: isLeaf
TreeNode.description: Set as a leaf node (valid when loadData is set). When it is false, it will be forced as a parent node
TreeNode.description_zh: 设置为叶子节点 (设置了 loadData 时有效)。为 false 时会强制将其作为父节点

TreeNode.name: key
TreeNode.description: Used by the tree's (default)ExpandedKeys | (default)CheckedKeys | (default)SelectedKeys property. Note: the key values of all nodes throughout the tree cannot be repeated!
TreeNode.description_zh: 被树的 (default)ExpandedKeys | (default)CheckedKeys | (default)SelectedKeys 属性所用。注意：整个树范围内的所有节点的 key 值不能重复！

TreeNode.name: selectable
TreeNode.description: Set whether the node can be selected
TreeNode.description_zh: 设置节点是否可被选中

DirectoryTree.name: expandAction
DirectoryTree.description: Directory expansion logic, options: false | click | doubleClick
DirectoryTree.description_zh: 目录展开逻辑，可选：false | click | doubleClick
